targets.expr:
sum by (method, endpoint) (increase(backendai_api_request_duration_sec_sum{job="$component"}[1m])) 
/
sum by (method, endpoint) (increase(backendai_api_request_duration_sec_count{job="$component"}[1m]))

sum by (task_name, status) (increase(backendai_bgtask_processing_time_sec_sum{job="$component"}[1m])) 
/
sum by (task_name, status) (increase(backendai_bgtask_processing_time_sec_count{job="$component"}[1m]))
